item.title: Is Getting Certified Worth It? Do the Benefits Outweigh the Costs?
item.description: If a certain certification or license is required for the position you’re seeking, then making a decision is easy - you don’t really have a choice. [Examples of obligatory certifications]. But what if it’s not strictly necessary? While you could see the benefits in theory, you’re not sure if you should go through with it, given how much time and money obtaining a certification would require. You’re looking at the options, pondering: “Is this worth it?
